messages.content: "As a local community worker I know the challenges you and your family face. I am standing to be your voice and to put people first."

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will kick start a Green Industrial Revolution with policies such as a £6 billion investment to retrofit every home to the highest energy efficiency standard, which alone will create at least 35,000 green jobs in Scotland.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: £70 billion of new investment for Scotland
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will invest an additional £70 billion in Scotland’s people, communities and public services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Build council houses and end homelessness
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will build 120,000 new council and social houses in Scotland which will end homelessness once and for all, creating at least 50,000 jobs. Already a Labour Council in North Ayrshire is building 1575 new council houses over the next few years.
Invest in the NHS, Scrap Universal Credit, Give local people a pay rise, End food bank Britain, Let the people decide

issues.brexitEurope: The Tories handling of Brexit has been a mess and Labour has a plan to fix it through a people’s vote.
issues.economy: Labour is offering £70 billion of additional investment for Scotland.
issues.environment: Labour will tackle the climate emergency.
issues.health: Labour created the NHS, only Labour will rebuild our NHS.
issues.labourEmployment: Give local people a pay rise, Labour will increase the minimum wage to £10 an hour.
issues.socialWelfare: Scrap Universal Credit, Labour will end the misery of the Tories’ Universal Credit. End food bank Britain, No one will need to rely on charity to feed their family under Labour.

community.content: Build council houses and end homelessness

endorsements.endorsement: Louise is a working class woman with a brilliant track record of community activism. For too long the interests of our communities have been ignored. Louise will change that, she will be a champion for local people, putting us before the interests of the few.
